title: Realme Narzo 80x's RAM, storage, and color options surface
description: Realme recently introduced the Realme 14 Pro Lite in India and will launch the P3 Ultra in the Asian country soon. Realme is also expected to unveil the Narzo 80 series, including the Narzo 80x. Realme hasn't divulged anything about the Narzo 80x yet, but a rumor claims the Realme Narzo 80x's Indian model will have two color options and three memory configurations. [#InlinePriceWidget,13706,1#] The source claims that the Realme Narzo 80x will be offered in Deep Ocean and Sunlit Gold colors with three memory options - 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB. Realme...
excerpt: It might not be an entirely new smartphone, though. Realme recently introduced the Realme 14 Pro Lite in India and will launch the P3 Ultra in the Asian...
text: Realme recently introduced the Realme 14 Pro Lite in India and will launch the P3 Ultra in the Asian country soon. Realme is also expected to unveil the Narzo 80 series, including the Narzo 80x. Realme hasn't divulged anything about the Narzo 80x yet, but a rumor claims the Realme Narzo 80x's Indian model will have two color options and three memory configurations. Realme 14 Pro Lite 256GB 8GB RAM₹ 23,999 The source claims that the Realme Narzo 80x will be offered in Deep Ocean and Sunlit Gold colors with three memory options - 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB. Realme P3x Furthermore, the source claimed that the Indian unit of the Realme Narzo 80x will have model code RMX3944 - the same as the Realme P3x launched in India last month. If true, that implies the Narzo 80x will just be a version of the P3x, meaning it will come with the Dimensity 6400 SoC, a 6.72" FullHD+ 120Hz LCD, a 50MP primary camera, and a 6,000 mAh battery with 45W charging. The Realme P3x also has IP68/69 rating and MIL-STD-810H certification. Realme P3x Source
html:
Realme recently introduced the Realme 14 Pro Lite in India and will launch the P3 Ultra in the Asian country soon. Realme is also expected to unveil the Narzo 80 series, including the Narzo 80x. Realme hasn't divulged anything about the Narzo 80x yet, but a rumor claims the Realme Narzo 80x's Indian model will have two color options and three memory configurations.

Realme 14 Pro Lite

  • 256GB 8GB RAM₹ 23,999

The source claims that the Realme Narzo 80x will be offered in Deep Ocean and Sunlit Gold colors with three memory options - 6GB/128GB, 8GB/128GB, and 8GB/256GB.


Realme P3x

Furthermore, the source claimed that the Indian unit of the Realme Narzo 80x will have model code RMX3944 - the same as the Realme P3x launched in India last month. If true, that implies the Narzo 80x will just be a version of the P3x, meaning it will come with the Dimensity 6400 SoC, a 6.72" FullHD+ 120Hz LCD, a 50MP primary camera, and a 6,000 mAh battery with 45W charging. The Realme P3x also has IP68/69 rating and MIL-STD-810H certification.

Realme P3x

Source
